attributes.action: Allow MP's residing more than an hour and a half commute from London access to standard accommodation in a fully managed facility close to the Houses of Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government should engage an independent management organization to run a currently unused housing development close to Parliament and offer fully serviced accommodation to MPs who have constituencies further than an hour and a half commute from London. The overall cost would be much less than the current cost of expenses claimed and would provide a level standard of facility for those MPs

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
